attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: smoking kills aprox 30.000 a year.absoloutely nothing in this day and age would be allowed to be marketed that is known to cause lung cancer, heart disease,kidney, liver,etc,etc.if you have to wear a seat belt to prevent injury.drugs are banned becuase there bad for your health.pharmacuticals are tested rigourously.this is for our own good ? you are charged with looking after the publics health.so how can tabaco be lawfuly sold ? i can only conclued that the bilions in revenue make it ok. therefore your puting money before the publics health when it suits ? otherwise it would be banned
